content: your first crochet beginner sweater is a free and easy crochet pattern that is made to measure size inclusive and beginner friendly kiks + jack crochet started our blog with the goal of creating easy crochet patterns the type of garments that beginners would find simple and fast to finish despite all our patterns being beginner friendly and pretty easy we really wanted to design a first crochet beginner sweater pattern so this is the pattern for all those amazing crocheters who want to crochet their first sweater we stripped out the hard stuff actually it s not that hard and made your first crochet sweater super easy your first crochet beginner sweater is a long sleeved warm sweater that is made from half double crochets it features a boatneck design that can be customized to be off the shoulder or crocheted as a tighter on the shoulder style there is no ribbing on the base of the sweater or cuffs on the sleeves to keep the pattern simple for beginners your first crochet beginner sweater is designed to hit slightly below the waist with an oversized look
